vAjaq(gm)q hanU$ByAmaqpa AqsyE#nA&&*diqtyA-~jCmaSru#Bi-rupayAqma-madha#rEqNOShThE#naq sadutta#rEqNAnta#rENA-nUkAqSaM pra#kAqSEnaq bAhya(gg)# stanayiqtnuM ni#rbAqdhEna# sUryAqgnI cakShu#rByAM ~Mviqdyutau# kaqnAna#kAByAmaqSani#M maqstiShkE#Naq bala#M maqjjaBi#H || 44 
(vAjaqM pa~jca#vi(gm)SatiH) (A12)
